mapper.select: SELECT LINK, PATH, datetime(DATE, 'localtime') as DATE, METHOD, PASS, AUTH FROM SHARE WHERE PATH LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT PASS FROM SHARE WHERE LINK = #{link}
SELECT PASS FROM SHARE WHERE PATH = #{path}
SELECT sg.SHARE_LINK, gs.NO as GROUP_NO, gs.NAME as GROUP_NAME, sg.AUTH FROM GROUP_SETTING gs LEFT JOIN SHARE_GROUP sg ON gs.NO = sg.GROUP_NO and sg.SHARE_LINK = #{shareLink} ORDER BY GROUP_NAME
